grizventure-rp
Summary
Welcome to #grizventure-rp! This is the start of the #grizventure-rp channel.
DM [Griz] BOT 07-02-2022 08:39
The rain comes in sideways, and comes in hard as you make your way through the clearings west of Krezk. By Ravenloft standards, the day had been rather pleasant, however turned sour not too long after your departure. A request from Dainan Graybelt and Urun Bonegrip with the promise of shared fortunes drew you from the safety of the town walls, after a significant archeological discovery halted their most recent mining site. The pair of dwarvern mining magnates are smart enough to know when to call in help, and given the rumoured troubles of this latest expedition, they are clearly taking no chances.
DM [Griz] BOT 07-02-2022 08:41
Some time passes, you continue to battle the piercing rain as its intensity begins to feel like cold needles on your skin. Eventually you can see a dim light through the sleet and fog, a warm beacon in the dreary landscape. Getting closer you can see the light flickers, and is that of a handful of candles on the inside ledge of a window. The building is rickety timber, clearly it has been erected with little care for its longevity, just another temporary station for the excavation works of the Echo Depths Mining Co.
DM [Griz] BOT 07-02-2022 08:43
Numb fingered and wet, you pile up to the small cabin door beneath the verandah that runs the span of the building. Behind the structure you can just make out through the weather a rather sheer drop from your current position, as excavation works have cleared several hundred feet down into the earth. The beginning of a wooden walkway can be seen disappearing off the edge, you assume to scale the descent below.
DM [Griz] BOT 07-02-2022 08:46
Aware of your arrive on the porch, the door takes no time to fly open, and a stout man stands within it, barely coming up half way, he has a large nose and long brown hair. His face is filled with creases from a life of hard labour, but there is a kindness in his eyes not often seen in these parts. "Quick, quick, come in before you become permanent fixtures out there!". He ushers you inside, it is warm and comfortable and a much needed respite from the unpleasantness you have just endured.
Berit BOT 07-02-2022 14:19
A brown feathered aarakocra enters, he has two shortswords at his waist. One faintly glowing the other of an icey blue substance, his bow and quiver sit strapped to his back neatly tucked in the section between his wings. Berit was wearing an odd helm that allowed him to comprehend languages at will and his bag which was slung over a shoulder seemed to be primed and full. He stepped through the doorway and moves to the side unleashing the water from his wings. "Thank you for allowing me in, it is getting bad out there. I am Berit, Ranger and Cleric of Avrae, the Goddess of Luck and Fortune."
papapenguin 07-02-2022 14:24
Iris was surpringly calm despite being dripping wet as she made her way through the mud. The metal of her boots sinking into the ground as she stepped up to the door looking a bit annoyed by the rain. As she moved up closer she could make out the visage of a bird and a man standing beside it in the doorway. Hurrying up behind Berit she smiled and peered around the man and Berit. "Ah, i take it this must be the place?" Tryin gto clean herself off as best as possible she gave the two of them a small bow. "Where are my manners, pleasure to make your acquaintance. I am Lady Iris Von Abendroth, a follower of Kord and a cleric aswell."
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 07-02-2022 15:05
He makes his way in, his multi-colored eyes casually looking over the room they had just entered. He stands tall, his long dark hair hide his ears. He takes a deep breath. His crossbow claps against his scale armor. His shield is close to him as the dark complexion of the half-elf moves to a corner and stands there He doesn't say much initially. He listens to the other two introduce themselves, as he nods, "Antonio De Los Lobos, Cleric of Sehaine." He says, as he realizes that it appears that they all bought with them help from the gods.
Vanya BOT 07-02-2022 16:48
*Amidst the much taller occupants of the cabin, a fairy half their size shakes freezing rain from her iridescent wings. She grips a vial dangling from a necklace and repeats an incantation in Sylvan. Gusts of arcane wind swirl around Vanya as her rain-soaked clothing and hair is purged from any dampness. She snaps her fingers and a green pseudodragon appears around her neck. "Hi Kiri! Hope you weren't lonely." The fairy realizes she's not alone and greets the others. Oh...um...hi! I'm Vanya. I don't have a deity or anything, but I do have this pretty necklace." She shows off a flawless amethyst gemstone attached to a leather necklace.
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 07-02-2022 19:39
He raises a brow at her necklace, he is unsure of what it is. But he did think it odd that she would mention it. "Interesting, does the necklace assist you in some manner?" He holds up his amulet to show her, "Mine connects me to my goddess." He says he let's it go amd presses it close to his chest.
papapenguin 07-02-2022 20:06
Iris mimicked Antonio, reaching into her armor and pulling out an amulet with an open eye. "Mine aswell, It's fashioned in the symbol of Helm and helps me become more connected with him."
DM [Griz] BOT 07-02-2022 21:26
The small dwarvish man bustles around the room shifting books and moving pillows, he prepares the space and pulls a few chairs over from the dining table and puts them closer to the open fireplace that is currently beaming with warmth and light. "Urun will be here shortly, he is just making his way back up from below, I'm sure he won't be too long. Please, sit, sit." He taps the chairs and beckons you to relax, then rushes into the kitchen where you can hear him striking flint against steel and water pouring
Vanya BOT 07-02-2022 21:43
*Vanya skips over and comfortably plants herself on one of the offered chairs. Her feet, unable to reach the floor, swing absentmindedly as she stares into the mesmerizing flames. Without breaking eye contact with the fire, Vanya responds to Antonio,* "I found it on a guy that was trespassing in our woods. He was weird looking; had all sorts of cracks on his body. Anyway, when I put it on it started showing me things, like how to enchant my arrows."
papapenguin 07-02-2022 22:00
Iris made herself comfortable, taking a seat at the table and setting down some of her wet possessions. Her eyes turned to Vayna as she spoke, looking her over curiously. "Cracks on his body? How strange, was it a person or a monster wearing a humans skin so to speak?"
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 08-02-2022 00:19
He takes a seat and leans back, "So, tell us what of this... situation friend?" He nods listening to the story, as he nods. "Well, perhaps we can assist with figuring that out at some point." He looks to Iris glad that he was not alone in trying to figure out what it could have been. He gives her a nod.
Berit BOT 08-02-2022 02:14
Berit slides out a seat and waits for this person.
Vanya BOT 08-02-2022 17:33
"Not a monster, no. It was a red dragonkin. There were all sorts of crystals sticking out of its body, and its scales were hard as stone but looked like cracked glass." Vanya swirls her hand to create an illusionary image of the creature she speaks of.
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 08-02-2022 17:42
He raises a brow, and tilts his head some more. He shakes his head. "I will be honest, I have never seen anything like this beforehand.*
Vanya BOT 08-02-2022 18:38
"Yeaaaa...I thought they were weird looking. I'd say the gemstone looks better on me anyway. I mean, what's a dead dragonkin going to do with it?"
Berit BOT 08-02-2022 20:08
"So have any of you been to where they are digging?"
papapenguin 08-02-2022 20:42
"How peculiar. A red dragonkin? With crystals as well? As far as I'm aware its generally colored scaled dragons and crystalline ones. Though, admittedly I know the least about them."
Berit BOT 08-02-2022 21:12
"I only know of drakes..."
DM [Griz] BOT 08-02-2022 23:46
The man stops fussing in the kitchen and returns with a tray stacked with cups, saucers, a ceramic teapot and a few biscuits. He places it on a small table in the middle of the space then takes a seat in one of the larger leather armchairs. His feet hang from the chair, dangling a foot from the floor and he looks at you all and smiles "Thank you so much for coming, we are so excited to have you here. Please help yourself to the refreshments, again, I am sorry for the delay, Urun really should not be much longer. "
papapenguin 09-02-2022 00:12
Iris smiled, looking over the spread a bit expectantly. "No problem, I'll take a cup of tea please with a biscuit." Staring at the food she waited to be served, a few old habits dying hard from back when she was at home waited on hand over foot.
DM [Griz] BOT 09-02-2022 00:34
The man leans forward and makes a cup of tea for himself, then returns to reclining in the chair. "I forget myself, my manners are awful, I am Dainan Graybelt, proprietor and partner of the Echo Depths Mining Company. Myself and Urun move around securing and mining certain optimal deposits of land within the region, we have become quite successful at this over the last decade" He is clearly very proud of their accomplishments.
DM [Griz] BOT 09-02-2022 00:35
" We had some men down one of our new shafts just last week when one uncovered a piece of stone out of place within the environment, when he and the others excavated further they found what looks to be a cornerstone of some kind, manmade in its precious with various glyphs inscribed up on it. Immediately we were notified of the discovery, and since then we have managed to carefully excavate an entire length of wall down there.. quite incredibly really."
DM [Griz] BOT 09-02-2022 00:36
He sips his tea and looks at you, the golden light of the fire flickers in his warm eyes.
DM [Griz] BOT 09-02-2022 00:40
"After excavating around half the wall, we discovered an enclave with that appears to be a door in it, however by this time some of our miners were falling ill, and Urun was starting to feel a little under the weather too. We figured it was just the feverish excitement of such a find, but Sunday just gone one of our men.." He shuffles in his seat uncomfortably "He uh.. passed. Then we knew that perhaps there is more to what lies below than we are aware of. We lack the conviction and constitution for such a task, but believe ones such as yourself may be able to assist us in discovering what wealth lies below, we of course will pay *handsomely* for your efforts."
rycoth 09-02-2022 00:53
Ber: "Any of you still suffering from this ailment?"
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 09-02-2022 01:01
He does not take any of the tea, but he does sit there. His eyes watching the man. He does his best to take in the words he is saying. More then anything, he is trying to spot a lie. The man leans back in his seat, and looks to him. His gaze is steady. "When this discovery was made, did anyone try and open this door? How did this man, I am guessing pass on?"
DM [Griz] BOT 09-02-2022 01:05
He nods his head "Sadly yes, Urun has been slowly getting worse, and I've asked him to just stay away from the wall for a while be he insists to keep checking it - I believe he may be worried someone else may get down there before we do. News spreads fast in the industry.. As for the door we have tried but cannot open it, although my feeling is even if we had been able, we still would have waited for assistance before venturing further."
DM [Griz] BOT 09-02-2022 01:07
Taking another sip of his tea, he continues. "Habadah passed at home with his family thank the gods, but going from a fit, reliable miner, to being bedridden and barely able to breathe only a week or more later... it's awful. The other's are starting to feel similarly, I fear their conditions may worsen still."
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 09-02-2022 01:57
He nods along, and looks to the man. "This is terrible." He says as he shakes his head. "This affliction, it effects the respiratory system nothing else?"
papapenguin 09-02-2022 02:10
Iris listened to the man eventually just getting to work with her own tea. Slowly she added sugar mixing it as she took a sip. "How sad.. It may be some type of magical protection to ward off attempts to open it. Would anyone be skilled in the arcane to cast a spell to gauge it's magic and dispel it? Perhaps open it magically." (edited)
Vanya BOT 09-02-2022 02:29
Vanya continues to stare into the fire. "No. I'm more of an enchantress than a disenchanter," she interjects. "I'll have herbal tea, if you have it, with honey. How long before Urun returns? Shouldn't he be back by now?"
DM [Griz] BOT 09-02-2022 02:38
Looking to Antonio he replies "Unsure, he was just so weak in the end, he could barely breathe. He was a shell of himself."
DM [Griz] BOT 09-02-2022 02:38
The stound man looks out the front window from his chair. "mmm yes... he really should have been back by now. He was going to be back before your arrival, and we were expecting you sooner. I'm not sure what is keeping him. Perhaps we are best to head down and I can show you what we are talking about, find Urun on the way.."
Berit BOT 09-02-2022 02:39
Berit had been listening and had an idea. "I can make an echo of myself to try the door."
DM [Griz] BOT 09-02-2022 02:42
Dainan looks at you, puzzled "An echo? That sounds.. complicated." He drops from the chair back to the floor and takes the tray, returning it back to the kitchen. From behind the door he retrieves a long leather coat with a woolen lining and a strange head contraption that looks like a metal bowl and a strap, a candle sits in the side of the bowl. He puts his coat on, then straps the contraption to his forehead which surprisingly, once lit, lets out a considerably impressive beam of light in front of him.
DM [Griz] BOT 09-02-2022 02:42
"Shall we?"
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 09-02-2022 03:11
He looks to him, very curious about what is going on. The mention of his partner not getting there seems to strike more concern in his eyes.
Berit BOT 09-02-2022 03:34
"It is not complicated but yes we should go find your man especially if he was injured."
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 09-02-2022 04:15
He nods, and rises. "We should get going."
papapenguin 09-02-2022 04:18
Iris finished her tea, setting her cup to the side and standing herself. "Indeed, my name is Iris for those of you who showed up late. I'm gifted with divine magics and am adept at healing."
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 09-02-2022 04:26
He nods at Vanya, as he rises. "Yes, the rest of us had some time to meet one another. I am Antonio De Los Lobos."
DM [Griz] BOT 09-02-2022 04:33
The man opens the cabin door, and steps out into the prickly night. He leads you along the worn timber boardwalk that extends from the main porch of the building down towards the crevasse behind. Over the howling of wind and whipping rain he yells "YOU MAY WANT TO HANG ON A LITTLE TIGHER THAN USUAL, THESE OLD SCAFFOLDS CAN BE A BIT HAIRY IN THE WIND!"
DM [Griz] BOT 09-02-2022 04:35
With that said, he steps over the edge and begins to walk down the timber slope, each length of wood hung by a rope that has been staked into the rockly cliffside, a very poorly made rope handle is all that exists to support you as you begin to descend down the face of the hole.
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 09-02-2022 04:37
He raises a brow, and looks to the scaffolding. "Baroniva, where the building standards are just awful as the monsters."
DM [Griz] BOT 09-02-2022 04:40
Overhearing your comment the man chuckles "YES, GUILTY AS CHARGED"You can see his small form shaking up and down in front of you as he obviously continues to laugh to himself. (edited)
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 09-02-2022 04:42
He sighs as he takes deep breath to climb down. "The pride..."
papapenguin 09-02-2022 15:10
"Well.. I do- Not like the look of this at all. If I do fall however.. Don't worry, i trust that my god will protect me." Iris looked worried for a second, gathering her resolve as she gently tugged on the rope handle and began to climb. If at any point she began to fall she readied herself to summon her wings.
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 09-02-2022 19:55
He looks to Iris, "Friend, we will have you covered. This will not be your last place here. Of this, I can promise you." He says as he climbs down ahead of her.
DM [Griz] BOT 09-02-2022 23:21
You all continue to descend the horrifically haphazard series of walkways, it takes a good 10 minutes, all the while the wind whips and the rain continues to feel like a million tiny needles on your skin. Eventually you come to the landing, where the boardwalk continues on and oil lanterns struggle to stay lit along the wall, leading to a large opening of the mine.
DM [Griz] BOT 09-02-2022 23:32
He turns to wait for you all to make your way down behind him, which you do quite deftly, and he forges ahead and into the mouth.
DM [Griz] BOT 09-02-2022 23:34
Once inside your hearing is restored as the wind and rain falls away and becomes a soft white static. along the walls are several sconces lit with torches, various tools; picks, shovels, hammers etc, lay against the stone walls of the mine entrance. "Well, I hope you folks are ok with a bit of small, cold, and dark, this is the one way in and out of here."
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 09-02-2022 23:40
He shrugs, "There is light without darkness. The two are meant to be together."
papapenguin 10-02-2022 00:05
"I'm fine with dark, is everyone alright?" Iris did a quick headcount, making sure everyone was alright before turning back towards the man "Quite a remote area, dangerous for a mine no?"
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 10-02-2022 02:05
He nods, "The further away you are, the less questions get asked."
DM [Griz] BOT 10-02-2022 02:14
Dainan turns to Antonio "Good head on your shoulders there lad. Sometimes it *pays* to be *aways*"
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 10-02-2022 02:19
He nods, "Nothing like being overly questioned and regulated." He continues to walk forward. His eyes looking to the rest of the group.
Berit BOT 10-02-2022 14:09
"The dark is a bit hard for me to see in but i can follow one of you who can see."
papapenguin 10-02-2022 14:15
"Allow me Berit." Iris moved closer to Berit with a smile. Slowly she outstretched a hand and tapped Berit on the shoulder. A light began to emit from the bow as a bright light filled the area out to 20 ft, providing an additional 20 ft of dim lighting. "This should suffice, if you need me to i can also dismiss it rather fast to kill the light."
Berit BOT 10-02-2022 14:23
"Awe I did not want to be a bother, but thank you."
papapenguin 10-02-2022 17:26
"It is no bother, if there is anything else that you need feel free to ask. We are a team and we aren't sure what awaits us."
Berit BOT 10-02-2022 17:37
"That is a relief in previous endeavors it has been every person for themselves so to speak."
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 10-02-2022 18:08
He looks to them, "We are in this together friend." He says as his eyes begin to scan in the low light. "Thank you, Iris."
Berit BOT 10-02-2022 18:43
"It is great to know we are all in this together."
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 10-02-2022 20:38
He nods to him, Of course friend, it is together where we succeed. No?"
papapenguin 10-02-2022 21:02
Iris smiled, clutching her shield and pointing to the eye emblazoned on it. "Likewise, I will look over all of you and tend to any wounds you may incur."
Vanya BOT 10-02-2022 21:12
"And I'll kick anyone's butt who tries to hurt any of you," squeaks Vanya as she floats down from above.
DM [Griz] BOT 12-02-2022 21:36
As you talk you find you are defending quite a way down. The path forks and winds, you take passages which are clearly to move through space, and enter open rooms which would have been mined if their deposits. After a while the air gets stale and shallow breathing becomes harder.
DM [Griz] BOT 12-02-2022 21:39
eventually you come to a room, that es extremely long, at least 100ft. Running down the entire right side wall is a flat, smooth, blackness. It's impervious surface not something you've ever seen before looks as though it were polished marble made from the blackest night sky with not a join in sight. Along the entirety of the wall you can see in the dim light a series of shapes and lines, they individually appear to make little sense but when you observe the wall in its entirety they seem to make up done kind of pattern. In the centre of the wall you can see a cutaway hole, you'd assume a recess to where the door that was spoken of resides.
DM [Griz] BOT 12-02-2022 21:41
Dainin rushes ahead of you, yelling "Urun!? Urun!" you see him rush around the corner to the door way canal, and return some moments later with a worried look on his face.
DM [Griz] BOT 12-02-2022 21:42
"He's... He's not here. But his equiment is. I don't understand.." He continues to scan the room frantically.
Berit BOT 12-02-2022 21:45
"He went through?"
DM [Griz] BOT 12-02-2022 21:49
he shakes his head "No.. no I can't see how he would have, the door is sealed still and we had no way to open it. Nor did we think it was a good idea. I just can't think where else he would have going though."
Berit BOT 12-02-2022 22:00
Berit sighs... how does he tell this man that his friend is likely dead as happens to all things in this place eventually. "Guess we can look for him."
DM [Griz] BOT 12-02-2022 22:09
The man looks to Berit "look for him? Look where? He's no here, and I highly doubt he's through there!" He points to the doorway, which now in your new position you can see down the tunnel in the impervious black wall. It would run -at least- 10ft deep before another solid black wall can be seen, this door has the same shapes and lines as the rest of the wall with one significant difference. They are emitting a green glow from certain lines and shapes.
Berit BOT 12-02-2022 22:37
Berit walks up to odd wallander touches it trying to trace the glowing lines.
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 12-02-2022 23:08
He looks at the door along with Berit.
papapenguin 13-02-2022 00:20
Iris looked a bit confused, looking over to the impervious black wall as she mutters in celestial. The lines on her shield becoming illuminated in a magical energy. Walking along the wall Iris scanned for anything that seemed out of place or some sort of lever.
papapenguin 13-02-2022 02:15
Iris pointed towards the symbols, showing the repeated nature of them. "The symbols, they seem to be repeating. Perhaps we could bring down the wall by breaking it magical sequence?"
DM [Griz] BOT 13-02-2022 02:20
Dainin looks very distressed and is muttering to himself, pacing backwards and forwards. As you inspect the walls and door he turns to you "I can't think of where else he would go, he was so focused on being down here I had just assumed he would be here. I am best to go search the other sections of the mine, perhaps the ground camp too. Can i leave you here to look into this? Really we just want to get it open and makes sure its safe on the other side. Your reward will be hefty once you complete the task, that I can promise you."
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 13-02-2022 03:05
"Who are we to turn down such a gracious opportunity?" He says while looking around the area where the man possibly left.
papapenguin 13-02-2022 14:00
"Even without the promise of money I'd look into this. Such a strange occurrence may put others at risk. If you insist on checking the other sections i suggest bringing help just in case."
DM [Griz] BOT 13-02-2022 21:32
"Of course, I'll be going back to base camp and pulling some of the leadership team from their duties to help, I wouldn't be able to search the place by myself! See what you can do here, and perhaps meet me back at the cabin afterwards?"
DM [Griz] BOT 13-02-2022 22:15
He scurries off leaving you all with a long black wall, some glowing symbols, and not much else.
papapenguin 14-02-2022 03:09
Iris looked towards the repeating pattern on the wall, pointing towards it. "We could try to erase or break the repeating pattern of glyphs. Would anyone like to try and help me?"
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 14-02-2022 03:12
"Is that is something that can be done?" He asks Iris, unsure that I can be.
papapenguin 14-02-2022 03:22
"Possibly, though arcane magic isn't my speciality."
AM
"Anyone have any other ideas before u start messing about?" Iris waited for someone to speak up with an idea ready to use her magic to bolster their capabilities
Berit BOT 14-02-2022 14:47
Berit looked around "This wall could be dealt with if someone has magic that pertains to stone. Like a way to move it or something."
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 15-02-2022 20:51
He shook his head, "I have a spell, but I do not have it prepared. Perhaps, we can try your method and I can prepare it another time?" He says with an arched brow.
Vanya BOT 16-02-2022 14:09
Spending time in her own little corner of reality, Vanya flutters over to the glowing runes on the door. The varying levels of intensity caught her gaze while the others struggle to find a way through. "Hmmmm...." With a burning curiousity, she reaches out and touches the brightest glowing symbol.
DM [Griz] BOT 16-02-2022 19:38
As Vanya presses the glowing symbol, Iris and Antonio, who are currently back from the door, would notice the symbol illuminate in a handful of places down the wall.
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 16-02-2022 20:18
He presses one of the spots that illuminates.
DM [Griz] BOT 16-02-2022 20:20
As Antonio presses one of the additional symbols, it increases in luminance, under his finger he can feel an electrical current, it tickles a little. The symbol back where Vanya is touching, begins to brighten.
Vanya BOT 16-02-2022 20:44
"Oooooo....it's like a puzzle. Neat!"
Vanya BOT 16-02-2022 20:49
Vanya presses another illuminated symbol and conjures an ethereal hand to push the coordinating symbol on the wall.
papapenguin 16-02-2022 21:12
Iris thinks for a moment, mapping out as many symbols in her mind as she attempted to help Vayna figure out the proper order "Here, let me help you these over here may be the next ones?"
DM [Griz] BOT 16-02-2022 21:35
As Vanya removes her hand from the first symbol and onto the second, she can see the light fade away from the first symbol she has touched.
DM [Griz] BOT 16-02-2022 21:38
touching the second lights it up more as it had the first. Again, symbols down the wall light up in another 3 places.
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 16-02-2022 22:32
He looks to them, "I think we may need to do this at the same time or in a particular order."
Vanya BOT 16-02-2022 23:42
"Looks like it." Vanya presses the rune she previously touched.
DM [Griz] BOT 16-02-2022 23:51
Vanya returning her hand to the first glyph, and it restores it original, intensified glow. The glyph further down the wall Antonio had their hand on lights up once again, along with more of the same symbol further down the wall.
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 16-02-2022 23:55
He jumps and keeps his hand on there, "Aye!!!!"
DM [Griz] BOT 16-02-2022 23:56
a sharp shock runs through Antonio's fingers and arm as the light coarses down the wall.
Berit BOT 17-02-2022 00:32
Berit tries to touch the wall as well
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 17-02-2022 15:05
He looks to them, "Becareful with the symbols, they can sting friends."
papapenguin 17-02-2022 17:17
Iris examined the wall, moving herself over towards some of the symbols herself. Carefully she looks over towards some of the lit buttons. "I'm going to try some of the buttons over here."
DM [Griz] BOT 17-02-2022 21:54
As both Iris and Berit push in more of the same symbol, light increases from behind their palms. Iris feels a bolt of electricity surge through her palm, but manages to keep her hand on the wall. Down at the door Vanya sees the rune under her hand glow with increased intensity to the point that the small alcove it completely lit up. Within a moment the wall can be felt rippling with energy underhand and all four of the adventurers are push from their positions back to the floor. The glow remains on the symbol on the door, the room is bathed in white light.
papapenguin 17-02-2022 21:56
Iris held her hand painfully as the electricity surged through her. Stepping back as the rippling energy knocked her to the floor. Looking up at the light in awe she turned towards the others. "This seems better then the darkened wall atleast!"
Berit BOT 18-02-2022 14:49
"Beyond this I am unsure what to do."
papapenguin 18-02-2022 15:39
"Take care with pushing buttons, something zapped me. This wall seems to be protected magically, I'll stay on standby and administer healing to the wounded." Iris waited a bit back, watching Vayna and her ethereal hand work.
Vanya BOT 18-02-2022 18:26
"Neat! Let's try that again." Vanya presses a different faintly glowing rune.
DM [Griz] BOT 18-02-2022 18:29
As Vanya touches the next softly lit rune on the door, it's counterparts down the length of the black wall begin to glow softly as the last ones did. (edited)
Vanya BOT 18-02-2022 18:43

DM [Griz] BOT 18-02-2022 18:53

Vanya BOT 18-02-2022 19:00
"Alright! Okay, who's next?"
papapenguin 19-02-2022 00:38

Berit BOT 19-02-2022 01:39

DM [Griz] BOT 19-02-2022 01:42

DM [Griz] BOT 19-02-2022 01:46
Berit, who thrusts their body into the wall, still manages to cover the last glowing rune and once more, the adventurers are thrown from the wall. The small room where Vanya is is now as bright as midday, and one rune remains glowing on the door.
Vanya BOT 19-02-2022 01:54

DM [Griz] BOT 19-02-2022 01:55

Vanya BOT 19-02-2022 02:07

1
papapenguin 19-02-2022 02:31
Iris moved along the wall, looking for similarly shaped runes before pressing down another.
DM [Griz] BOT 19-02-2022 02:39
As Iris and Berit put their hands on the last runes, for a third time the wall ripples and throws them back. The light within the alcove is so bright now it is blinding. From the floor you can hear the slow grinding and clicking of cogs and gears as the door begins to slowly shift backwards. Vanya, who lay directly at the foot of the door watches as the passage way begins to extend, first by 5 feet, then 10, then 15. Clicking and grinding the whole time, the whole while the bright light illuminates the passage and you can see the newly exposed wall contains more of the same glyphs and patterns on it. After a few more moments the door begins to lift into the ceiling, the light it omitted begins to disappear from view, and the doors absence exposes a stairwell at the end of the now 30ft long corridor. The space goes silent
Berit BOT 19-02-2022 02:43

Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 19-02-2022 03:00

Vanya BOT 19-02-2022 13:48

papapenguin 19-02-2022 15:36
Iris followed behind the excited Vanya. Despite her own curiosity Iris was focused remaining vigilant as she scanned the area for potential threats "Be careful, we don't know what else is down here. Stay together"
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 19-02-2022 23:14

DM [Griz] BOT 20-02-2022 02:44
The air chills slightly as you descend and the already strong smell of dust intensifies. Whatever this place was, It was old. The tunnel extends some 100ft further, continuing to descend all the while runes softly glow along the wall as you walk.
DM [Griz] BOT 20-02-2022 02:47
Eventually the party arrive at a vast, expansive dommed room. As each of you step into the cavernous space the runes can again be seen as they line the walls and ceiling. All made from the same impervious black stone the space is imposing and grand. At the centre of it sits an ornate series of rings of stone in the floor, they span out from the centre of the room and end around half way across the floor in increasingly large disks. Around the far wall you can see 4 enormous doorway alcoves not dissimilar to the one you just came through, although these are circular by design. The room lays silent.
DM [Griz] BOT 20-02-2022 02:56
Kiri would whisper to Vanya to look at the dusty floor. It's Matt grey surface scuffed with the marks of shoes. Antonio would notice tucked against the edge of the the west side of the room is a strange metal pole leaned against the wall.
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 20-02-2022 02:59
He makes his way over to the metal pole. "This is odd..." He says as he looks and studies it. He does his best to see what it could be, or what it was even doing in this space.
papapenguin 20-02-2022 15:23
Iris walked around the domed room, carefully scanning the walls runes for similar looking ones. Eventually making her way over to an alcove she spoke up. "How was this undiscovered for so long? Think this is some ancient structure or something new that has emerged with magic?"
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 20-02-2022 15:33
"This has to have been here. I don't know of a magic that create a room in a place like this. The runes were placed here with great intention. Someone, some group, or some entity wanted this place to be difficult to get to and through."
papapenguin 20-02-2022 23:03
"Conjuration magics can be quite potent, my Father knew a few himself. But.. You do have a point, we should search for more runes to move on through this area." Iris moved around looking for another rune ready to be activated.
papapenguin 20-02-2022 23:20
Focusing her magic on herself Iris imbued herself with the magic of Helm as she focused on the runes.
DM [Griz] BOT 20-02-2022 23:24
In this chamber the runes all flicker and glow in a pulsating, breathing motion. They clearly still contain energy but it appears now within the space the energy is flowing freely, a significant difference to the exterior wall you came in by. The rings on the floor glow with a little more intensity. Slightly different runes can be see lining each layer, there also appears to be some form of small cutout in each ring. The shapes are different depending on the layers.
Berit BOT 20-02-2022 23:25

DM [Griz] BOT 20-02-2022 23:28

Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 21-02-2022 00:13

After eight hours you all awake somewhat refreshed, although, not quite..

papapenguin 07-03-2022 16:40

Vanya BOT 07-03-2022 17:09

Her eyes light up in excitement at the recollection of a specific memory. "This one time, we tricked a dryad in a field of redcaps. That was funny. But the time that..um, why we were exiled. Well, Kiri, can you show them?" The pseudodragon familiar begins to project mental images and memories into your minds. A precocious fairy and her tiny dragon friend flying along a picturesque coast. They come across a small cave littered with bones and small baubles. Within, you can see the pair encountering a sea fury. Instead of fleeing, the fairy begins to kite the fury back to her Fey community. "We thought it would be funny..." she trails off sadly. More images are projected as the pair watch a massacre unfold. If not for the intervention of the archfey, the entire community would have perished. "His Majesty decreed that Kiri and I would be separated and I sent to dwell among men and guard the moon wells from their greed, never able to return to the Feywild." Her eyes lit up again. "But I found a way to bring Kiri to me!" She holds up an amethyst gemstone on a necklace. "This told me how to do it, and now she's here!" (edited)

DM [Griz] BOT 11-03-2022 05:18
As Berit grabs one pole, Iris another, and Antonio helps Vanya, the three of you begin to push against the three poles. Feet skid and slide across the still wet stone floor and the silent room is now an echo chamber of groans and grunts as you all struggle against the weight of the enormous stone floor. At the moment you begin to run out of steam and defeat sinks its small claws into the back of your mind, the floor gives and begins to churn around together. The huge circle spins slowly and a great groan can be heard from beneath the floor. You all heave and push and sweat, the floor rotating inch by inch until finally - as the rods align with the central door - there is a huge crash as the stone lock plunges another few feet into the surface of the chamber. As it does, a wave of white light spreads out through the runes and markings that cover the floor and walls, rippling across the surface before vanishing. The central door, just like the others, begins to slide away, revealing a final path.
Berit BOT 11-03-2022 14:21
"Guess its time to explore that corridor."
Vanya BOT 11-03-2022 14:27
"Yep! Let's go....yaaaawwwwnnnn. I need a nap."
papapenguin 11-03-2022 15:44
"Be on your toes, there may be more traps or enemies lurking. Stay together and watch each others backs." Iris gripped her shield tightly, in her other a wrapped amulet with the engraving of an eye belonging to Helm on it. (edited)
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 11-03-2022 20:50
"We should probably make a point of keeping an eye out for something." He says, as his eyes scan the corridor.
Berit BOT 13-03-2022 02:34
Berit looks to the group and gies airborne for a better vantage point.
Vanya BOT 13-03-2022 02:37

Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 14-03-2022 15:52
"It is quite the boon to have two people with flight." He says as he follows along, his eyes searching to see if they can spot something that may lead them down the right path.
DM [Griz] BOT 14-03-2022 18:18
As you brush yourselves off and look to the opening there is a sense of dread that you feel within your bones. Stepping cautiously into the corridor you again hear nothing, and walk forward. The hall continues for some time, far further than the others and as it does so you feel yourself descending deeper into the earth. The cold seeps through the walls and there is a dry dustiness to the air you breathe, a dryness that only fills a space untouched for so long. Eventually you begin to see a soft glow cascade up the hallway floor, its warmth an encouraging and welcome change of tone in the dim cold space. As you step out of the corridor and into a new room you are instantly taken aback by the sight before you...
DM [Griz] BOT 14-03-2022 18:36
The room would run no wider than 40ft and no longer than 80ft, its walls again the same black impervious stone. In here the runes and glyphs ebb and flow softly in their brightness. At the opposite end of the room stand three very large figures, not quite humanoid, but not quite something else. Their hulking forms would seem scarier if it weren't for their dormant state. They would also seem scarier if it were not for what lay behind them... Behind thick Iron bars you see a cache of treasure unlike anything you have seen before. Piles of gold and jewels fill the small room they occupy, spilling out between the bars and onto the floor around the dormant figures. Their extraordinary mass washing the whole room in a beautiful golden light. Among the treasures you can see trunks gilt with gold and ornate carvings, beautiful chalices that are encrusted with rubies, a skull set on an ornate plinth with dull reddish gemstones set in the sockets, and a whole plethora of other treasures who's combined value certainly would pay for the trouble of reaching where you have. It is truly a sight to behold.
Vanya BOT 14-03-2022 18:44
Gasps with excitement.
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 14-03-2022 18:55
"Why do I have a feeling this is what they were actually looking for?"
Vanya BOT 14-03-2022 18:58

As Berit stands face to face with the giant machine he can see behind the bars the small skull that had previously contained dull gemstones in its eyes, now glowed with a ferocious red, its intensity increasing as the guardian's light dims..
DM [Griz] BOT 16-03-2022 02:18
As this happens the dwarven men collapse into the room out of breath and clearly terrified, they look up to see the glowing skull and three dead guardians immobile on the floor. A very bloodied dwarf who you have to assume was the missing Urun sits on his knees besides a gaunt and grey looking Dainan, who manages to utter a few words between gasping breaths. "No.... no it can't be... are all doomed."
DM [Griz] BOT 16-03-2022 02:19
The room continues to darken, as the golden light that filled it from the mounds of gold that flowed forth from the cage begin to melt away into a black sludge, it oozes from the cage and slides along the floor. The skull glows brightly and begins to rise into the air.
DM [Griz] BOT 16-03-2022 02:20
The room fills with a laugh most chilling that the hairs on your arms and neck stand on end, and the most overwhelming sense of dread you've ever felt before fills your stomach, sinking it so deep you struggle not to vomit.
4
Berit BOT 16-03-2022 02:44
Berit unsheathed his Nightlight sword trying to illuminate the darkening room as he looked for his other sword he dropped in combat.
Vanya BOT 16-03-2022 02:48
Vanya tries to overcome the sickening feeling as she conjures her four glowing leaves to illuminate the darkened room.
DM [Griz] BOT 16-03-2022 02:56
Your attempts to lighten the room work somewhat, but the cold darkness is more than physical, it's emotional too. Behind you Dainan can be heard sobbing quietly, his constitution clearly not that of the bloodied adventurers who lay on the floor. The skull slowly floats forward, the red light from within the gems of its eye sockets intensifying to a point that you struggle to keep looking. Pushing through the space in the bars you watch in disbelief as tendrils of inky black stretch out from within it, not substance, but a lack thereof. They twist and wind and drop towards the ground, writhing and licking at the grey tiles of the floor. The air chills and slowly as it moves you see the skull take seat on shoulders, then torso, then waist and legs. A physical form where one was not was slowly appearing from the black void. Everyone in the room struggles to move, gripped in fear of what was transpiring before them, but also gripped by something else, part of their life being pulled from them to fuel the production of the one that was developing before them. The low uncomfortable laughing slows and as a jaw, flesh and sinew begins to stretch and materialise on the skull a voice proceeds to speak, its timbre empty, cold, and booming. "AT LAST... MY MY.. YOU HAVE DONE *SO* WELL."
DM [Griz] BOT 16-03-2022 03:01
The skull finalises its transformation and a figure floats before you.

Berit, feeling the full force of the Lich's fearsome presence as it looms above him, would recognise such titles and know with a deep, soulful knowing, that the party had just turned the last bloody key on the last lock that had been holding the great Arch-Lich Vecna at bay. He turns to Vanya and Berit "MAKE WISE USE OF IT, WHEN YOU ARE IN MOST NEED. A PIECE OF ME, NOW WITH YOU. AS SUCH, PART OF MY NEWLY RESTORED POWER TO HELP TIP THE SCALES IN TIMES OF GREAT NEED, MANY OF WHICH LIE AHEAD. JUST KNOW, I GET TO TAKE A LITTLE PIECE OF YOU TOO." He laughs again and again, the sounds reverberates around in your skull like a cave.

papapenguin 16-03-2022 05:20

DM [Griz] BOT 16-03-2022 05:42
The dwarves and yourselves walk in silence. Back through the hall, back past the enormous arcane lock in the floor, back up and through the entrance to the tomb. Everything feels strange, the light looks different, brighter. You feel a deep sense of dread in the pit of your stomach, but at the same time you feel... powerful. Invigorated. Thirsty to experience life and the things outside. You each walk in silence as you grapple with the conflicting internal debate that is transpiring between your cells. Back up the shaking scaffolding that hugs the gorge and eventually into the small wooden cabin that sits a couple of hundred feet back from it. There is no wind now, no storm like when you arrived, just mist and silence.
DM [Griz] BOT 16-03-2022 05:44
Danian and Urun open the door and usher you inside, Danian heads to the kitchen where he puts the kettle on, while Urun disappears, presumably to change his clothes. You are each handed a fresh towel, and after each of you wash up, scrub the blood and sick and dust from your faces and nails. you all return to the sitting room an hour or so later, feeling fresh and surprisingly chipper. The same can not be said for the two dwarves, who each look like they have been dragged though a specific kind of hell to reach where they sit now.
DM [Griz] BOT 16-03-2022 05:46

I know not how you might remove it, but I would be doing everything in my power to not submit to the temptation of using the power it holds."

DM [Griz] BOT 17-03-2022 01:42
The pair watch you as you converse about the philosophical and spiritual nuances of power, a little enthralled by the discussion. Urun snaps from it first and interjects. "If you do wish to seek help, I imagine there are those in Barovia who may know of ways... although, I do know I have heard the name Vecna before.. and I don't believe much good was associated with it. There's a woman who frequents Barovia, Morgantha I believe her name was... I've heard she is skilled with such things."
Antonio De Los Lobos BOT 17-03-2022 01:45

Avrae BOT 20-03-2022 00:01
Avrae BOT 20-03-2022 00:17
AM
DM [Griz] BOT 22-03-2022 21:56
The lights come up and 4 adventurers are a few drinks down, and through the randomness that is these cursed lands, find themselves seated around a table at the Blood on the Vine tavern in central Barovia. The din in the tavern is strong today, high energy in the air. It's not even 9pm yet and already you have seen 3 drunkards tossed from the front door in a comatose state. Over the hubbub Barzor overhears a conversation from the table next to you as a man's voice begins to raise in frustration. "It's not right! How can no one fucking know where she is? No one?! Someone's not saying something an I'm damn well going to fucking find out" The tall dark haired man stands from his chair abruptly and storms from the tavern, his companion, a rather weedy looking man with a pocked face and a slightly lazy eye sits at the table still looking defeated.
Chit'al, The Blessed One BOT 22-03-2022 22:16
Chit'al was sitting at the bar quietly, her drink infront of her barley touched. She was careful to pace herself, not wanting to spend the entire night drunk walking around the town again. As she heard the mans voice rose Chit'al turned her head, scanning the room for the loud man. Dropping a few coins on the counter, pushing her hand forward she tightened her cape around her shoulders, walking over as she looked down on the man sitting down. If you are in need of help locating this woman.. I can be of assistance.

DM [Griz] BOT 03-05-2022 05:11

Chit'al, The Blessed One BOT 04-05-2022 11:17
Chit'al seemed rather focused, her eyes scanning the area as they walked. She was rather quiet, seemingly finding it a bit harder to bond with the others. As they came up upon the camp she keep a slight distance between her and the others, separating to explore the outskirts of the camp for clues. Her voice echoed out in the minds of the others as she quietly split, letting her chameleon plating assume the colors of the environment around her.
(Nix) Strahd‚Åπ Blinko‚Å¥ -4 05-05-2022 23:04

Chit'al, The Blessed One BOT 17-05-2022 00:13
Do not worry, I will remain within my telepathy's range. Chit'al nodded her head, walking the perimeter of the camp slowly. The chitinous plating on her body changing colors to match her surroundings. Slowly she moved as quietly as possible, crouching low to the ground as she examined the outskirts of the perimeter. She'd look for any signs of a struggle, dropped objects or strange looking footprints.
DM [Griz] BOT 17-05-2022 00:27
Chit'al spends some time walking in and around the camp, tents glow softly from the inside, illuminating the square with purple, red and orange hues from their decorative fabrics. Loud laughter can be heard from the tavern and the occasional straggler walks by. Overall nothing seems out of the ordinary, no evidence of struggles or fights, no signs of foul play. Just another night in the camp.
Chit'al, The Blessed One BOT 17-05-2022 00:29
Chit'al returned towards the group, shaking her head side to side as she pulled her hood lower trying to hide her face in the light. What is our next move?
GRIÃ∂Z ‚ï† Seron¬≥ ‚ï£ 17-05-2022 22:11
The group call it a night and each find respective beds in and around the encampment. When dawn breaks they reconvene and begin to go about searching once more for the next piece of this puzzle. With a name in hand and an empty pigment pot they begin to ask the locals if they recognise anything about it. After a few hours of fruitless results one quiet and rather eccentric person pipes up from the shisha lounge. They are sprawled back in a loose beanbag and their eyes are rather bloodshot, but they are well dressed. "Severus? Severus Berceanu - my you must be uncultured indeed to not recognise that name.. He is one of the lands most well known painters, an exceptional portrait and still life artist, he's well before his time you know? Exquisite use of Chiaroscuro, really brings out the depth of his subjects. He's a little reclusive, and a bit strange, but an excellent fellow. His manor is back in Barovia." A solid lead and a definitive name in hand the party thank the unusual man and make their way back to the township Barovia proper, where unfortunately through the power that is the chaos of these lands, the reign of Strahd creates more pressing matters, and the plight of Lottie falls by the wayside. Not to abandon those in need, Viktor takes the name tag, and scrawls a quick note which they pin to the board within the tavern they frequent so often, hoping that perhaps another may pick up where they left off...
Avrae BOT 17-05-2022 22:11
Avrae BOT 07-08-2022 23:47
DM [Griz] BOT 08-08-2022 04:40
While spending an afternoon in the tavern, you overhear a conversation in which two mean speak of local woman Ilda Rowntree, a proud local woman, and mother of three. It appears as though not one, but two of her beloved children have not returned home, nor been seen since yesterday, a very unusual event in its own right, and even moreso given the impending marriage of the eldest brother Justice. With keen ears burning the men conversing notice your interest, and inform you of Ilda's house should you choose to lend assistance. Gathering your belongings from beneath the table and settling your tabs you head out and up the hill. The house is by no means lavish, but you can tell that what is here is well cared for, and a sense of pride can be felt from the entrance and surrounding gardens....

DM [Griz] BOT 10-08-2022 00:13
As the group splits up they each take a different section of the house... Guthor Guthor walks into Doran's room and is instantly given a better insight into the man. A small single bed sits beautifully made in the rear corner, a window by the bedhead. There are all manner of small tin toys and collections of items that sit along the window sill and on a bookshelf at the foot of the bed. The bedspread is a bright blue with white clouds on it, as is the ceiling of the room - one must imagine its a way to give Doran a sense of freedom in an oppressive world. On the bed are a few stuffed toys too. Along one wall hangs a whole host of picture frames, photos of Doran with Justice, Doran with Justice and Yvette, if you didn't know better you'd say it looks like photos of a child with their parents - clearly Doran loves them both very much. Fedha As Fedha enters Justice's room she would be taken aback by the simplicity and order that is present. Simple and clean, the bed is well made, with sheets tucked well into the corner and a single pillow at the top of the bed. Along the wall beside the bed are a series of certificate and honours they appear to have earned throughout their education and subsequent training in the local guard. There is a small desk and deskchair, lovely green leather is inlaid into a dark brown timber. On the desk is a neat pile of paper, a quill and inkwell, all very orderly. A beautiful portrait of Justice and Yvette is framed on the wall by the bedroom door, its beautiful, they look very happy. Nothing seems out of place at all here. Thurkier *Thurkier takes Janshai's room. Upon opening the door it is dark and stale. The curtains are drawn and only the smallest sliver of light breaks in through the central crack in the curtains. DM [Griz] BOT 10-08-2022 00:13

DM [Griz] BOT 15-08-2022 20:52
You all say your farewells to Ilda and she waves you off from her neat little house, tears in her eyes. By now the sun has set and the night begins to quieten as you move through the dark misty streets of Barovia to the library she spoke of. After some time you arrive at a small alley tucked away nearby the Blood on the Vine tavern. There is no sign on the door but upon entering you can see this is more of a secret hideout than a library as such. Filled with hundreds of books but with equal parts chaos and order, the sprawling rabbit warren of a building has several tiny rooms each with small oil lamps that cast dark shadows across the many exposed spines of the dusty shelves and walls. Down the end of one room by candlelight sits a thin man hunched over a book, and surrounded by many more. He appears deep in thought
Thurkier BOT 15-08-2022 22:20
Thurkier pokes his head inside, his black scales shimmering as the uneven light from the lamps shines on him. He raps the back of his hand against the door. "Hello?"

Dante BOT 30-08-2022 10:23

Guthor BOT 31-08-2022 02:10

I mean no reason to eat live flesh if there are alternatives.‚Äù
DM [Griz] BOT 31-08-2022 02:16
As the party take their leave from Yvette's residence they begin to make their way out of Barovia proper and along the road toward the Tser pools. It is in these quiet moments that you can remove yourself from the horrors of these lands, the trauma that is pressed upon you, on the poor citizens of these wretched lands at all times. As you travel the fog falls heavier, its murky tendrils lick at your boots and legs, sitting heavy over the ground. Vision becomes trickier as the evening approaches midnight. In silence you continue along the road, as you do, the small mumblings of Guthor do not stop Thurkier from hearing occasional, soft rustling in the trees around you.. It may just be the wind, or the odd rabbit or fox, though either way it makes them uneasy. Fedha turns at one point and can see Janshai looks anxious, he fidgets with his hands and squints through the fog as they walk... Half an hour passes, however in the final moments you can all hear the rustling increase, it is difficult to ignore, and that is when you begin to notice several sets of piercing eyes watch you, silent and unmoving..
Fedha BOT 31-08-2022 02:38
Fedha grabs the handle of her sheathed rapier as a precaution. "Please tell me you all see the eyes watching us and I'm not going crazy." She whispers to the group.
DM [Griz] BOT 31-08-2022 02:47
Janshai steels himself and whispers to the others "These roads are never safe at night... this is why our folks are so worried they didn't come back.. I can help, I know a little from my studies, just tell me what to do."
Thurkier BOT 31-08-2022 03:14
quietly walking besides the group, he pulls out his crossbow and loads it, ready to call out shots. "Hmm... we may have some company. Janshai, help where you can, but stay safe, alright? If things go south... get out of here." he breathes in, holds it, and let's it out. "An if you got anything that can light a fire from a distance, let me know..."
Dante BOT 31-08-2022 03:14
Dante's hand also drops to his rapier hilt. It's hard to see his bared hangs through the mists.
Guthor BOT 31-08-2022 04:24
Guthor sees some eyes in the darkness. He rushes forward to investigate.
DM [Griz] BOT 31-08-2022 04:25
As Guthor moves towards the dense shrub they can see a glowing pair of sharp eyes, as they draw near the visible outline of a very large creature becomes clearer...
Guthor BOT 31-08-2022 04:35
hold
DM [Griz] BOT 31-08-2022 04:39
The creature watches at Guthor splits and shifts, and where one now stood four... without so much as a blink the beast continues to hold its gaze, a low rumbling growl fills the air around it. Meanwhile Janshai looks around and murmurs a few words, tapping a finger to their chest a streak of blue flashes out, covering their body in soft glowing light before fading away
Thurkier BOT 31-08-2022 04:47
Thurkier notices a bit of movement in the fog, sniping it with his bow, but not getting a clean shot. "Damn! It's in the fog." he pulls his crossbow back quickly, reloading.
DM [Griz] BOT 31-08-2022 04:55
As Thurkier strikes the creature with an arrow it lets out a piercing howl, the sound of which breaks the silent night with a very worrying volume.
Dante BOT 31-08-2022 11:17
Dante charges forward, pulling out his blade as it bursts to life with radiant light. He thrusts the rapier into the beast, killing it, but he can feel his own bloodlust rising...
DM [Griz] BOT 31-08-2022 13:11
From out of the thick mists enormous wolves stalk... their hair is matted and their teeth bare, the snarl and begin to move in, taking flesh from those they can. (edited)
Fedha BOT 31-08-2022 21:28
Fedha eyes widens as she sees the wolves. She pulls out her viola and plays a melody that's high pitched and painful to listen to. The sound seems to be emanating from just behind the wolf in front of Janshai.
DM [Griz] BOT 31-08-2022 22:00
Janshai throws his arms out in front of him at the beast, luckily Bill is by his side and lends aid, distracting it somewhat, however the attack does not do what he had hoped, and Fedha can hear him cursing under his breath.
Guthor BOT 31-08-2022 22:01
Guthor raises his rapier and a green fire licks across the blade. He swings at the beast in front of him and flames leapt to the other beast.
Thurkier BOT 31-08-2022 23:36
Thurkier sees the pack descending onto his group. Seeing Fedha and Janshai getting swooped down on, he sends a shot directly between the beasts shoulder blades. "Hey, yah dumb mutt! Over here!" he pulls out his black knife and assumes a ready stance.
Dante BOT 01-09-2022 00:59
Dante jumps to his feet after being savaged by the wolves. He lashes out at the injured one, but misses. Bloodlust rising, he thrusts out again, piercing the beast's heart. As it drops he turns to its companion and bites into a lupine haunch, but fails to get any of the blood into his mouth.
DM [Griz] BOT 01-09-2022 02:50
As another wolf falls, the one nearby Dante and Guthor rounds on them, it stretches its jaws wide and with it the air begins to chill around them... within seconds the beast unleashes a torrent of freezing air, it blasts out and over the two adventurers. Icicles crackle and run across their weapons and armor. As the biting air beings to float softly to the ground, covering it with a fine white powder, the creatures eyes begin to glow red, what happens next shocks both Guthor and Dante. "THIS. WAS. NOT. THE ARRANGEMENT." The voice echoes across the forest path, and before anyone could say otherwise, the beasts eyes return to their piercing golden colour.
Fedha BOT 01-09-2022 03:07
Fedha runs up to the wolf in front of her before attempting the strike it with her rapier. It merely bounces of its hide and she groans in disappointment. "I thought I sharpened this before I left."
Guthor BOT 01-09-2022 03:16
Guthor rushes over casting booming blade and strikes down the wolf behind him, then turns back to help Dante screaming at the wolf to try to draw the attack.
DM [Griz] BOT 01-09-2022 03:35
As the beast collapses at Janshai's feel you see him look impressed with the efforts of the group, his anxiety dissipates somewhat and he throws his hands out in front of himself again, this time you see the large wolf that remains falter on its feet. Blood oozes from its pointed ears and it howls in pain as Janshai wreaks havoc on it. "HELL YEAH! This is what I'm talkin' about! All that study finally paying off huh!? We've got this!" (edited)
Fedha BOT 01-09-2022 03:38
Fedha gives Janshai a high five.
Dante BOT 01-09-2022 22:10
Though terribly wounded, Dante wields his luminous rapier with expert skill as he attacks the wolf. He cuts deep and manages another bite but he neither fells the beast nor tastes its blood. "I've got a Potion of Greater Healing in my coat," Dante calls out to the others, seemingly apropos of nothing.
DM [Griz] BOT 01-09-2022 22:38
The beast inhales and once again lets out a stream of freezing breath upon Dante and Guthor. The blast is so strong it sends Dante to the ground, unconscious and body shivering. (edited)
Fedha BOT 02-09-2022 13:08

Dante BOT 02-09-2022 13:30

Guthor BOT 02-09-2022 20:19

DM [Griz] BOT 02-09-2022 20:20

His victorious retort lasts but a second before he looks around anxiously through the fog, not confident they were alone yet
Guthor BOT 02-09-2022 20:21

Guthor BOT 02-09-2022 20:22

DM [Griz] BOT 02-09-2022 20:33
As the group sort themselves out they tend to Dante's wounds and begin on the path once more wasting no time. You resume your walk, the night is quiet once more and despite the unsettling words from an oversized wolf and the bloodshed that had ensued, there is still a peace about the place. After 10 more or so minutes of walkings and the fog lessens somewhat as you can start to see the trees open up a little, the canopy overhead becomes sparse and those who have been down to the local Barovian fishing hole would start to recognise they have almost reached the lake they sought. Stepping out into the clearing the water sits still as a mirror, and across it a fine later of fog floats quietly in the night. Through the dark you can see the silhouette of a large ball of a figure that sits unmoving by the lakeside. Janshai pipes up. "Doran!? I think that might be Doran.. Just, just wait here, let me go talk to him - He'll be overwhelmed if all of us approach from behind. Just stay here till I call you down and I know he's OK."` Janshai slips off ahead of the group and down toward the water's edge. (edited)
Fedha BOT 02-09-2022 20:37

DM [Griz] BOT 03-09-2022 20:41

You watch was Janshai reaches the figure and it stands up. Whoever it is, they were large. At least 6"5 and built like a house, the two can be heard exchanging words, and the pit of Dante's and Thurkier's stomach drops out when again the black masses in the water appear again, they look to be bodies. As the warmth drains from your face, and small beads of cold sweat sprout from the pores on your brow Janshai's voice raises from indiscernible muttering to an agonising cry. "YOU FUCKING MORON! WHAT HAVE YOU DONE!?"

DM [Griz] BOT 05-09-2022 02:21

"YOU WERE ONLY SUPPOSED TO KILL HIM YOU USELESS PIECE OF SHIT. IT WAS ALL FOR NOTHING!" A pause of silence, as though time goes from slow to non-existent, and then the gush of blood from the throat of the figure, as you see the small knife held between Janshai's knuckles. He breathes with laboured breath, clearly enraged, as the body before him collapses to its knees, and lands face first in the shallow water.

DM [Griz] BOT 12-09-2022 01:21

As this happens, a greyish black mass begins to swarm and surge in the air above the centre of the lake, it looks as though two human forms were made of smoke and mist, tussling and fighting one another in some ephemeral battle... Suspended in the air, each blow sends a resounding "crack" through the air.
Thurkier BOT 13-09-2022 01:13

DM [Griz] BOT 14-09-2022 23:08
Chaos ensues. The vitriolic, revenge fuelled Yvette splashes into water with a dull thud and her corpse begins to sink below the water. The long tendrils of hair swirl and spiral across the surface of the lake like slippery eels that wind and coil as they are pulled slowly beneath the surface by the dense body, before completely slipping from view. As everyone begins to run, the torrent of energy and fury that dominates the air above the lake grows. The piercing cracks that shake the ground grow in volume, and the two forms slowly spin and writhe, merging from two singular silhouettes locked in combat into a singular one. The air fills with screams of horrific proportion as the mass begins to push out limbs, first two arms, then two legs, their vision difficult to define as the space between limb and air, real and ephemeral shifts and shudders amid the chaos. A deep dread fills the stomach of everyone as the air grows chilly and the sound is drained out of the space around them to be replaced only by the harrowing rattle of crying, of screaming, and of whipping wind. Pushing up the path Doran cries and sobs as he runs, wiping the tears he cranes his neck to look behind him one last time at his two brothers, and beloved Yvette. They had fallen at his hands, but not by his will, and while he could not comprehend what had happened to him, a deep and soulful dread and sadness had overcome him. The strangers who were with his brother had taken the life from them and so he did what any terrified creature would do.... run... ...Only not to, as his legs freeze up under him, the horrifying figure of Dante by his side, vampiric teeth bare and eyes frenzied, the poor Doran stands inert as dark lines run down the front of his trousers and the tears continue to fall from his chubby face.

DM [Griz] BOT 18-09-2022 03:54
You all walk silently through the mist for the next 15 minutes. The gravity of the situation, of the ambition of Janshai to coerce his own brother to murder the eldest, the knowledge of the conversations that would lay ahead with both Doran's and Yvette's parents, the bleak and hollow existence of even the most basic of residents tarnished by the atmosphere in which they all reside under the thumb of The Devil Strahd, all of it crushing and unrelenting. As you arrive back in town you make your way slowly toward the home of Doran, his mother, and siblings. The man has still said not a word, and toward the garden path. The lights in the front livingroom are softly lit, Ilda clearly still awake inside. You all head up, letting Doran lead towards the door before he stops still suddenly, and turns to you. "How.. how do I tell her? How can she forgive a son like me?"
Dante BOT 18-09-2022 04:29

He looks to Doran, to see if the young man will condemn them as murderers, whether he will confess to his own part in the deaths, or whether he will support Dante's explanation that allows them all to walk away free.
Fedha BOT 18-09-2022 17:07
Fedha turns to the group and lowers her voice. "I don't want to lie to them and I don't want to leave anything out. Are you going to tell them or should I?"
Guthor BOT 18-09-2022 19:37
‚ÄúI uh, people don‚Äôt, uh are you sure you want to?‚Äù, Guthor starts mumbling to himself and starts to awkwardly look around for a place to hide. After a little while he realizes that there is no place to go, so he stares blankly at a spot on the wall next to him. He puts a contemplative look on his face as if there were some beautiful art work there. Humming to himself as he stares, some incomprehensible tune that continuously changes melody.
1
Fedha BOT 18-09-2022 19:39

Dante BOT 18-09-2022 19:57

Thurkier BOT 18-09-2022 19:59
*he slowly walks in, and motions for the families to sit. "they..... he killed them. Janshai did. He said it was only meant to be justice, but... Yvette...." he swallows hard, blinking his eyes a bit. "I'm sorry."
DM [Griz] BOT 18-09-2022 22:45
Yvettes mother's goes white, collapsing into Dominic's arms unconscious. The man trembles, just staring at you as the words leave your mouth, his expression unwavering as though his ears simply do not accept what they hear. Ilda hugs Doran tightly. "Is what they say true!? Did... Did Janshai make you... kill them?" Her voice cracks and struggles to form the sounds as her brain too refuses to compute the information she is hearing. Doran, face buried in her neck can be heard speaking in muffled, sobbing grunts "I think so.. I thought it was a dream..." Ilda slowly shuffles across to the armchair, swinging Doran around and sitting him into it still cradling his head, she turns and looks to you all with hollow, broken eyes and simply nods. A knowing, an acceptance, a thank you, and a leave us be, all in a single muscular movement. Dominic slides to the floor still holding his unconscious wife and Ilda turns back to her broken boy, holding him tightly. You all take a moment before slowly stepping back out the door, closing it quietly behind you. The mood drops from depressed to unbearable as you step down the garden path, unsure of whether to drink now in celebration of a job well done, or in sorrow for another set of families torn and broken by these desolate lands that insidiously infect everyone, no matter how simple. As you reach the gate, a man stands across the street, tall and slender, with a sharp jawline and slick black hair. He claps slowly "My thanks, you managed that moronic child well and saved me the energy I'd rather not spend on vermin like him. A wasted endeavour in him? Perhaps. However without it I'd not have born witness to your skill." He looks to Dante "You my young friend, did do quite well indeed, it seems you may be of more use yet."

Dante BOT 18-09-2022 22:50

Alas, your next evening of drink at the tavern shall be on me, isn't that nice? Thurkier BOT 18-09-2022 23:34

DM [Griz] BOT 18-09-2022 23:41
Strahd raises a brow at the response "Me? A villain? Ha! You've got sass girly, and if flattery is ever to go far with someone, it's me. Yes, a fine crop indeed." He places his hand in one of the internal breast pockets of his long coat, and from it removes a selection of ornate golden coins. With a single flick of his thumb one lands in each of the adventurers hands. "Should you ever need me.. Oh, and you may want to tend to the boys you left at the lake sometime, I'd hate for them to get loose from the lake..." The slender figure gives a small nod to the party, and with a snap of his fingers the space in which he resided is replaced with soft wisps of black smoke. Standing in the now desolate street illuminated only by the dispersed silvery light of the moon through the mist, the party is left alone again with the heavy cocktail of emotions of this very long evening.
Dante BOT 18-09-2022 23:43

DM [Griz] BOT 19-09-2022 01:12

DM [Griz] BOT 19-09-2022 01:12
A week or so later from that evening and the heavy feeling of that night still sit with you somewhat, less, but there regardless. You find yourselves together having a drink at the Blood on the Vine when Ilda come in through the door, she carries with her a small sack. Her face gaunt, her eyes dark, this is a woman who has clearly wrestled demons in the depths of the night since you last saw her. She approaches the table and gives you all a weak grin "I wanted to thank you for what you did. You brought one son back to me, and that has been a shining light in all this darkness. That evening could have cost me everything, but with your efforts, Doran was saved. I know we spoke of payment, I am sorry I've not seen you till now." She puts the cloth sack on the table "Here is the gold I promised, it isn't much but it's all I had stashed away. I do however have some things of Justice's I'd like you to have... its too painful to keep in the house. I also found this in Janshai's desk... I cannot read them, but I feel it's of worth somehow." She slowly removes a collection of items. A ring, a small parcel of cards bound in string, a small instrument, and soft woolen cloak. She hands the cards to Guthor, the ring to Dante, the cloak to Thurkier, and the instrument to Fedha. The bag contains enough gold for you each to take 750gp each, a tidy sum for a woman like Ilda. "Thank you again... I wish you all the best."

DM [Griz] BOT 01-11-2022 00:04
It has been two days since the letter from Burgomaster Dmitri Krezkov reached you, and in the days since you have spent time shopping in preparation for the trip to assist. You set off together early in the morning, just as first light begins to illuminate the myst that fills the air, blanketing the landscape in soft white light. You have been travelling for several hours down the Old Svalich Road, when as you crest the top of a hill you see a group of people coming towards you. It is obvious from a distance these people are refugees. They carry overloaded packs and trudge along with heads bowed low. Some among them sport bandages and more then a few limp. It becomes clearer as the parties near, that this dejected procession is led by an old man in a hooded cloak...

1
DM [Griz] BOT 02-11-2022 02:39
He rolls his eyes somewhat, but the egotist in him cannot resist the chance to badmouth the Burgomaster's shortsightedness. "Folks've been going missing for weeks now.. at first no one thought much of it. Folks waking up in the morning, and their partners were just gone from bed... Put it down to adultery, or seeking more from life. But after the 4th or 5th person disappeared things seemed more serious. Then the rats came. hundred's of'em. Furry horrid little things. They was filling the square at night, and folks began to say they saw some of the missing people with em! We called and called for Krezkov to seek help, to find out what was happening, but the stubborn brat.. he said "Krezk is strong, we manage our own issues". He just buried his head in'th sand! Well, we had enough when it was kids that started goin' missing. I'm taking me and mine to Vallaki. Start a-fresh there. I suggest you turn around and do the same. There's nothing but idiocy left behind the walls of Krezk."

Akhen BOT 02-11-2022 21:17

DM [Griz] BOT 02-11-2022 22:16
"A cry for help a month late, is simply a cry for help so you can say that you were not negligent." Holding the top of the walking stick in two hands, he raises it and thumps the ground. "The young fool should have listened to council, so much suffering could have been avoided. I hope that the rest have seen sense, that you find then travelling this way on the trail." He smacks his lips and thumps his gnarled cane on the ground again in frustration. "No place is safe this close to Krezk, your offer is appreciated but ill-advised. We intend to travel until the moon is high in the night sky, before we make any kind of camp. Best of luck to you if are helping that stubborn fool, you have a challenge ahead." With that the old man nods, and begins to walk once more down the path away from you, the others following behind sheepishly.

DM [Griz] BOT 06-11-2022 00:50
In the morning you all rise quite early, just before the mist lights up from the hidden sun it seems, and make your way together back down the path toward Krezk, feeling somewhat satisfied by your decent deeds of the day prior. The day is mild for Barovia, but the first northwest you travel, the air begins to chill, and after another hour or so the mist thickens somewhat. Eventually you mount the crest of a hill which opens up the valley in the distance where Krezk sits quietly in the snow, the mists sitting thick around the valleys bowl so that only the second half of the cities walls protrude through the top, like a log that breaks the surface of a still lake. Black smoke smoulders up from several of the buildings within.

DM [Griz] BOT 07-11-2022 01:46
The group quickly makes their way down into the valley, the air is crisp and as you draw closer the smoke that rises from some buildings within the high walls of Krezk appear to not be those of chimneys. The fog tugs at your heels, but does seem a little different now you are down in it... more viscous. The strangest part is that when you are by the city walls, the air doesn't feel as cold and dry, but somewhat muggy, the fog seeming to be more precipitation than Barovia's usual mist. Around the city walls there appears to be a large amount of large wooden spikes that run into the fog. As you approach the gates there stand four armoured guards atop the ramparts, crossbows pointed. One of the men claps a hand around their mouth and shouts to you "Turn around now strangers, there is nothing for you behind these walls!"
Vorr BOT 07-11-2022 01:49

DM [Griz] BOT 09-11-2022 01:33
You all cautiously shuffle through the gates, inside there is very little activity, the streets are quiet and some of the windows and doors have been boarded up. For any of you who have had the pleasure of visiting Krezk before, it certainly did not look this way last you were here. The air within the city is even more humid than what you had experienced outside, the sensation was a peculiar one given the landscape that surrounds Krezk. One of the guards from the wall appears by your side. "Please excuse Arthur, his son is missing. I'm sure the Burgomaster will fill you in, let me take you there..." He waves a hand for you to walk with him.
Zee BOT 09-11-2022 02:48

DM [Griz] BOT 09-11-2022 03:17
The man looks over his shoulder as he walks "Oil? Yeah I'm sure we have a bit, but despite our best efforts not much has worked. As for how long? Well... jeez.. probably 2 months now I'd say... but it wasn't always this bad. It was a bit of a slow burn you know? They weren't so "arrogant" at the start.." He rounds a corner and makes way for you to walk up a set of stairs, a quite lavish building sits at the top.
Vorr BOT 09-11-2022 03:55

Akhen BOT 09-11-2022 05:03
Akhen starts noting things down as the guard speaks "They're getting arrogant?" He lifts the pen up from his page twirling it in-between his fingers "Would you mind elaborating on that for me?" (edited)
DM [Griz] BOT 11-11-2022 11:29
The man fidgets a little. "Yeah.. brazen. At first there was only one, maybe two people going missing I've the space of a month, it wasn't *overly* strange for these lands, you know? But as the rat plague grew, townsfolk started to see loved ones in their presence when they invaded the city, but just a husk of them... With that, they started taking more, and more often.. now we face a challenge I'm not sure we can defeat... It was so pervasive and insidious in its genesis that no one paid it the attention it deserved." By now you reach the top of the stairs, and the guard knocks on the large wooden door of the ornate building at its zenith. A moment of silence before. "Enter." He gives you a nod and a perhaps hopeful smile. "For everyone who still stays in Krezk, we hope you are successful."
DM [Griz] BOT 11-11-2022 11:35
You all move through the door to a large, relatively plaibtroom, a little like an office in the front, but opening to white a multipurpose space , in the rear. A large open fire burns to the eastern wall, and several people are laid out in the floor behind the front of the room, being seen to by medical staff. A small middle-aged man, with a bald pate and a curly white beard stands behind a large timber table with a few others pouring over a town map. He dresses in furs and bands of plate armor and has a very stern look across his face. He looks to you and bellows. "WELL. That'd be right. That old idiot finally convinces me of reaching out to people beyond the walls, and those who heed the call take their *sweet ass time.*" He looks back to the map in front of him
Vorr BOT 11-11-2022 22:41
Vorr follows the group through the camp and into the building. When they reach the multipurpose room he stands next to the map to also get a look at it. He doesn't respond to the man's remark but waits for the others to speak.

Vorr BOT 12-11-2022 00:44
